string.name: txt-help-powerups
string.text: Powerups are blocks with special abilities. Each one has a unique talent.

string.name: powerup-desc-1001
string.text: No block bust needed. Instantly applies 2x scoring potential of surrounding blocks.

string.name: powerup-desc-1005
string.text: Changes all blocks to one color upon activation by connecting a row or column.

string.name: powerup-desc-1003
string.text: No block bust needed. Can be played on top of other blocks regardless of empty space.

string.name: powerup-desc-1006
string.text: Generates 6 stick-shaped blocks for the next turn.

string.name: powerup-desc-1000
string.text: No block bust needed. Fills 2 empty spaces around the block upon placing.

string.name: powerup-desc-1009
string.text: Shifts all blocks downward eliminating empty spaces in between rows.

string.name: powerup-desc-1002
string.text: Scatters random sprout blocks that will generate 2 blocks to fill empty spaces around them next turn.

string.name: powerup-desc-1008
string.text: Generates 6 Flood blocks for the next turn.

string.name: powerup-desc-1011
string.text: Generates 5 random blocks to fill the bottom rows of the board.

string.name: powerup-desc-1007
string.text: Adds 10 seconds of additional play time.

string.name: powerup-desc-1010
string.text: Fills the outermost rows and columns with snow blocks causing a massive block bust and scoring.
